ygData.subject: Re: word of possession
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought spreading viruses was a felony? Someone send the cops in the direction of the originator of the virus, Mr Richard Kubin (rkubin@bellsouth.net). And
ygData.messageBody:
I thought spreading viruses was a felony? Someone send the cops in the
direction of the originator of the virus, Mr Richard Kubin
(rkubin@...). And whatever you do, don't open happy99.exe, it
contains a virus.

At 09:01 AM 5/16/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Richard Kubin <rkubin@...>
>
>
>Attachment Converted: "c:\eudora\attach\Happy99.exe"
>
>

research. Please keep the emails on topic.
